channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Communal waste and litter on Mandela way road and pavement, 12th September
item.description:
There are two large communal waste bins on the pavement on Mandela way. There are also rubbish bags and litter on the road which is obstructing cars. These bins have been there over two weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mandela Way, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped a load of black bags under the trees outside NIMEGEN WAY, 12th September
item.description:
Constant flytipping in NIMEGEN WAY,every week,ongoing problem.The Council is doing nothing to solve this problem
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Nimegen Way, Dulwich Village, London

item.title: Bad road rattles my property, 12th September
item.description:
All day and night until the last bus runs, my house rattles to the bus schedule so every 10 mins all day, going both ways .have been reporting this for two years yet nothing done, Westwood lane has had new surface and not hook lane. Please take a look and don’t close the case again without looking into it. We all pay our taxes. This is keeping us up at night . The vibrations rattle glasses in the kitchen cuboard at the back of the house
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Lane, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Messy road, 12th September
item.description:
The close is covered with overgrown trees and bushes. The road is full of leaves berries (very slippery) and twigs. Half the road is unpassable by car and getting worse. We would appreciate it very much if the bushes could be cut and the road and curb-side could be cleaned.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tresco Close, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illuminated roundabout sign damaged., 12th September
item.description:
Illuminated roundabout sign damaged at the Bridge Road / Coper Cope Road roundabout, when coming from Bridge Road onto the roundabout. Electric installation exposed - risk of electric shock.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bridge Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked gutter, 12th September
item.description:
Entering Cray Valley Road from Poverest Road the gutter on the right hand side it full of weeds and rubbish thrown from cars. The growth of weeds is stopping the rain water from flowing causing flooding into driveways of Barmouth.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cray Valley Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over grown weeds, 12th September
item.description:
Over grown weeds in and around car park on Braganza street. It’s like a jungle, the weeds are growing that high they look like they are going to grow into the cars. The pavement can barely be seen and rubbish is being dumped. This is the 3 rd time this has been reported and nothing has been done!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Braganza Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large dog mess outside front door (in building close), 12th September
item.description:
There is a rather large lump of dog mess right outside my flats front door, within the building close. So the smell is horrendous and is hazardous. It is under the building staircase, outside 136. Right next to a wheelchair (I don’t know who the wheelchair belongs to but is also in the way).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peacock Yard, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet
